fields.name: Registration_Header_Info
fields.fieldText:
Thank you for your interest in becoming a member of our Customer Community. Please note that access can only be given to TechnologyOne customers that are live with a product and have transitioned from project to support. 


Requests from third-party contractors and or people that are not customers will not be permitted access to the TechnologyOne Customer Community portal. This includes third-party consultants known to TechnologyOne.


In order to provide you with access to self help, raise ideas for our consideration and support from the community, as well as collaborate with others and TechnologyOne, there are a few details we need from you to complete the registration.

fields.name: First_Name
fields.fieldText: First Name

fields.name: Last_Name
fields.fieldText: Last Name

fields.name: Organisation
fields.fieldText: Organisation
fields.helpText: Please provide the full, unique name of the entity that is registered as a customer with Technology One.

fields.name: Job_Title
fields.fieldText: Job Title

fields.name: Work_Email_Address
fields.fieldText: Work Email Address

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid email address. Must contain ampersand(@) and full stop(.).

fields.name: Work_Phone_Number
fields.fieldText: Work Phone Number
fields.helpText: Please provide a direct contact number to facilitate prompt issue resolution

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid Phone Number in International format. EG +61 731677300

fields.name: intended_purpose_for_community
fields.fieldText: Your intended purpose for the Customer Community

fields.name: Organisation_Support_Key
fields.fieldText: Organisation Support Key

fields.name: I_don_t_know_the_organisation_key
fields.fieldText: I don't know the organisation key

fields.name: User_Created_disp
fields.fieldText: Your request has been successfully processed. After you click Finish please close the Registration page and check your email inbox for login information.

fields.name: UserNot_Created_disp
fields.fieldText: Hi {!First_Name}. Unfortunately we could not process your request. An email has been sent to the Community Administration Team advising of this issue. You can expect to be contacted in due course. Thanks for your patience.

fields.name: User_Created_disp_0
fields.fieldText:
You now have access to the Customer Community for collaboration and self help. We will be in touch soon regarding your Case Management access.


After you click Finish please close the Registration page and check your email inbox for login information.

fields.name: DisplayNoAccount
fields.fieldText:
Hi {!First_Name}. We could not locate your Organisation making it impossible to process your request at this time. Ensure you are not using any acronyms or abbreviations in your organisation name. Please note that access can only be given to TechnologyOne customers that are live with a product and have transitioned from project to support.


If you require assistance please contact our Community Administration Team at t1customercommunityadmin@technologyonecorp.com

fields.name: Key_Contacts_Screen_0
fields.fieldText:
Please reach out to your internal Key Support Contacts who hold your Organisation Key:


{!varDispayContacts}


If there are no Key Support Contacts registered or if you experience any issues obtaining the Organisation Key, please reach out to our Community Administration Team at t1customercommunityadmin@technologyonecorp.com

fields.name: Key_Contacts_Screen_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Please reach out to your internal Key Support Contacts who hold your Organisation Key:


{!varDispayContacts}


If there are no Key Support Contacts registered or if you experience any issues obtaining the Organisation Key, please reach out to our Community Administration Team at t1customercommunityadmin@technologyonecorp.com

fields.name: Reactivation_RequestActive
fields.fieldText: Welcome back {!First_Name}! Thanks for submitting a reactivation request. Our Community Administration Team will review and action the request shortly.

screens.description: Welcome back! Thank you for requesting to re-activate your account. We will review the request shortly.
screens.name: Reactivation_Request_Message
screens.label: Reactivation Request

fields.name: Reactivation_Screen
fields.fieldText: Welcome back {!First_Name}! Thanks for submitting a reactivation request. Our Community Administration Team will review and action the request shortly.

fields.name: Upgrade_Request_0
fields.fieldText: Thank you for requesting to upgrade to Case Management access. Our Community Administration Team will review the request shortly and upgrade your account.

fields.name: Upgrade_Request_0_0
fields.fieldText: Thank you for requesting to upgrade to Case Management access. Our Community Administration Team will review the request shortly and upgrade your account.

fields.name: AbortingProcess_0_0
fields.fieldText: Hi {!First_Name}. Registration failed as you already have an account. Try resetting your password on the login screen. If you need assistance contact our Community Administrative Team at t1customercommunityadmin@technologyonecorp.com

fields.name: AbortingProcess_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Hi {!First_Name}. Registration failed as you already have an account. Try resetting your password on the login screen. If you need assistance contact our Community Administration Team at t1customercommunityadmin@technologyonecorp.com

textTemplates.name: AccountnotFound_text
EmailBodyCaseManage
textTemplates.text: {!First_Name} {!Last_Name} of {!Organisation} is requesting Case Management access within the Customer Community. User Account created {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} UTC.

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyEmailExists
textTemplates.text:
{!First_Name} {!Last_Name} of {!Organisation} is attempting to register for Customer Community access but the Email Address ({!Work_Email_Address}) is already in use. The problem occurred {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime} UTC.


First Name: {!First_Name}


Last Name: {!Last_Name}


Organisation: {!Organisation}


Job Title: {!Job_Title}


Work Email Address: {!Work_Email_Address}


Work Phone Number: {!Work_Phone_Number}


Intended Purpose: {!intended_purpose_for_community}


Organisation Support Key: {!Organisation_Support_Key}

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyUserExists
UserNotCreated_text
